scheme_name: Scheme for Establishment of Hi-Tech and Mini Dairy Units (Haryana)
description: This scheme provides financial assistance for establishing hi-tech and mini dairy units, with provisions for poultry farming, to promote modern livestock farming practices in Haryana.
key_features: Support for hi-tech and mini dairy units

eligibility.additional_criteria: Must have access to land and resources for hi-tech units

special_notes: Primarily focused on dairy but includes poultry farming
